ca.uwaterloo.crysp.otr.iface

Class Policy

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uwaterloo.crysp.otr.iface.Policy

  • public class Policy
extends java.lang.Object
    OTR policies are used to define per-correspondent behaviors for each contact Alice wishes to communicate with. The policies are any combination of the flags defined by this class.
